General.Name: GlobalBlock Digital Asset Trading Ltd
General.Description: GlobalBlock Digital Asset Trading Limited, a digital asset brokerage company, provides personalized telephone brokerage services in Lithuania. The company acts as an agent in the execution of trading and custody of digital assets for individuals, corporates, institutional financial firms, and intermediaries. It also offers a trading platform and mobile app. The company is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 65 Curzon Street, London, United Kingdom, W1J 8PE
